response.job_title: Optimization Engineer in BIO & cLean Team
response.summary:
Process and Chemical Engineer with extensive knowledge, experience and solid skills in process simulation and optimization, energy efficiency, data analysis and Integrated Management Systems (IMS). Strong data-driven mindset. 
Team player with experience in multidisciplinary and multicultural teams, excellent communication skills.
response.skills: Process Simulation, Energy Management, Process Optimization, P&ID, Project Management, Power Generation, Aspen HYSYS, Data Reconciliation, PROMAX, SigmaFine, PI Systems, Real Time Optimization, Integrated Management Systems, Gas Processing, Cooling System, Cogeneration, Aspen Plus

profile_positions.description: Development of Master Thesis - Cooling System Characterization and Optimization Study in Novo Nordisk, Kalundborg.
profile_positions.title: Master Thesis Student

profile_positions.description: Developing and supporting projects (mainly mass balance and utilities consumption) within the Manufacturing Intelligence Team for the process of Insulin active compound production.
profile_positions.title: Student Assistant in the Manufacturing Intelligence Team

profile_positions.description:
- Conceptual, Basic and Detailed Engineering for existing and new projects (Gas processing facilities and potable water plants).
- Design and execution of projects focused on energy performance improvement.
- Developer for the processing plant simulation to optimize the production using ASPEN HYSYS and PROMAX.
- Monitor and support the process to ensure the product optimal quality, looking for the  continuous improvement of production capacity.
- Responsible for the QA tests and the continuous training of the personnel.
- Developing and updating the Standard Operation and Quality Procedures.
- Supporting and developing the Integrated Management System (IMS) for the company.
- Control and Monitoring the potable water plant located in the facilities.
profile_positions.title: Process, Research and Development Engineer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for developing the As-built of the P&ID's for the plant facilities.
profile_positions.title: Chemical Engineering Intern

education.degree_name: Master of Science in Chemical and Sustainable Processes Engineering
